data.name: ConnectionLostMessage
data.value: The network connection is lost. Please try again later.

data.name: ConnectionTimeoutMessage
data.value: Sorry, the request timed out. Please refresh the page.

data.name: NoFavoriteLeaguesIntro
data.value: Favorite a league and allow notification to get updates!

data.name: NoFavoriteMatchesIntro
data.value: Favorite a match and allow notification to get updates!

data.name: AddedFavorite
data.value: Added to My Favorites & Subscribed push notifications.

data.name: RemovedFavorite
data.value: Removed from My Favorites & Unsubscribed push notifications.

data.name: FavoriteLeagueLimitation
data.value: You have reached the limit of {0} favorite leagues. Please remove some of your favorite leagues and try again.

data.name: FavoriteMatchLimitation
data.value: You have reached the limit of {0} favorite matches. Please remove some of your favorite matches and try again.

data.name: Question1
data.value: Not seeing the leagues you want?

data.name: Answer1
data.value: Go to Leagues, filter the tournaments, search for the tournament you want to see and tap the star icon to mark it as your favorite league. You then can quickly see the league that you want in the Favorite tab.

data.name: Answer10
data.value: We are working to extend the list of supported leagues. Sometimes you can still find your favorite league in the list of matches played at a specific date or in the list of leagues of a specific country (available in the Menu). If you find your league there, you can add it to Favorite Leagues to see it everywhere and always on top. * Take note that Favorite leagues are only visible on pages, which show matches from a day when the Favorite league has some matches too. For example, if the favorite league has some matches scheduled for Jan 25th and today it is Jan 20th, then the favorite league will not be visible on today's homepage. However, it will be visible on homepage of Jan 25th.

data.name: Answer11
data.value: Add the league to Favorite Leagues and it will never disappear again, and in addition you will always see it on top.

data.name: Answer12
data.value: You can disable push notifications for Score247 in the System Settings.

data.name: Answer13
data.value: If you find an error in our data, please write to us at http://www.score247.com/contact/ and we will fix the problem.

data.name: Answer14
data.value: Start times are shown in the time zone, which is configured on your device. To change the start times, change the time zone in your System settings. Please note that changing the time and keeping the old time zone won’t make any difference. It is the time zone that needs to be changed.

data.name: Answer15
data.value: Not at the moment, but we plan to add this feature.

data.name: Answer16
data.value: We are always working on adding more leagues. Feel free to request a new league on Facebook and we will consider it!

data.name: Answer17
data.value: Go to Settings, then Notifications to toggle on/off alerts.

data.name: Answer18
data.value: Go to Settings, then Info Alert. Here, you can manage all the notifications you receive by team.

data.name: Answer19
data.value: Oh no! Email us by tapping the following link: support@score247.com

data.name: Answer2
data.value: Go to Settings, then Info Alert to manage notifications by team, league, match, and player. You can also enable/disable Breaking News alerts here.

data.name: Answer20
data.value: - You can check if your network is ON first. - You can clear the phone memory & shutdown and restart. - If you still have this kind of problem, please send the screen shot of the page which cannot be loaded and your description to the [Feedback], there will be staff to help you as soon as possible.

data.name: Answer3
data.value: Mark any team, player, or league as your favorites by tapping on the Star icon placed next to it. You then can find them quickly on the Favorites tab.

data.name: Answer4
data.value: Navigate to League Detail page. You can get there from homepage or Live page by tapping the appropriate header (the row showing the league name). On the League Detail page tap the "Star" icon in the top right corner. If you return back to home or country page, you will find the league you selected at the beginning of the page.

data.name: Answer5
data.value: In the match list, tap the Star icon right next to the match or tap the Star icon at the top right corner on Match Details page. As long as the Star is yellow, your match is added to Favorite Matches and you will receive notifications for that match.

data.name: Answer6
data.value: Fixtures, Results and Standings (if applicable) for a league can be found by tapping on the header, which contains the name of the league. For example, to view Standings of the English Premier League, tap the "Premier League" header above the first Premier League match.

data.name: Answer7
data.value: Additional information is available when you click on the Full List icon at the league table. You can adjust your view to see the league table in Sort form or Full form. Default mode is Short form.

data.name: Answer8
data.value: Make sure that notifications are enabled for Score247 app in the System Settings, open the app, unsubscribe the match and re-subscribe it. If this does not help, contact our support so that we can take look at the problem.

data.name: Answer9
data.value: Line-ups change in time and we update them continuously. The most reliable data is usually available 1 hour or less before the match starts. We also show information about the last time the line-ups were updated and whether they are confirmed, although this information is available for some leagues only.

data.name: Question10
data.value: I cannot find my favorite country or league in the list of matches, can you add it?

data.name: Question11
data.value: My favorite league suddenly disappears from the list of matches. How can I prevent it?

data.name: Question12
data.value: But I don't want to receive notifications, I just want to see the match in Favorite Matches.

data.name: Question13
data.value: I have noticed an error in your data. Can you fix it?

data.name: Question14
data.value: The matches show wrong start time. How do I change it?

data.name: Question15
data.value: I added a league to Favorite Leagues and now it appears above another league, which I want to see first. Can I reorder the list of Favorite Leagues?

data.name: Question16
data.value: Why don't you cover certain leagues?

data.name: Question17
data.value: How do I turn off Breaking News alerts?

data.name: Question18
data.value: How do I turn off news notifications for a team?

data.name: Question19
data.value: Have an issue not covered in the FAQ?

data.name: Question2
data.value: Not getting the notifications you want (or too many!)?

data.name: Question3
data.value: Want to follow your favorite team, player, match or league?

data.name: Question4
data.value: How do I add a league to Favorite Leagues?

data.name: Question5
data.value: How do I add a match to Favorite Matches?

data.name: Question6
data.value: Where can I find standings for a specific league?

data.name: Question7
data.value: Your league tables only show number of matches played, goal difference and points for each team. Can you add more detailed information?

data.name: Question8
data.value: I subscribed notifications for a specific match, I see the match selected in my app (the star next to the match is orange), but I don’t receive any notifications. What should I do?

data.name: Question9
data.value: Your line-ups are all wrong. Can you fix them?
